github_body:
General changes:
* #350 When editing a 'try' route, you're redirected to the route edit page (keystone.guru/xxxx/edit). You can as such refresh the page as you like. You (or anyone with the link) can claim the route and save it to their profile.
* #328 'Published' is no longer a separate column in route tables. It has been replaced by an icon in the title.

Map changes:
* #352 Clicking on an Awakened Obelisk will allow you to easily place a gateway (and line between them).
* #305 Lots of internal changes to the structure behind the mapping, allowing me to more rapidly develop new features.

Mapping changes:
* #325 Corrected Tol Dagor/Shrine of the Storm Awakened enemies enemy forces on Teeming weeks. Fixed various other enemy forces calculations.

Team changes:
* #327 Admins may now leave their teams.
discord_body:
v3.0.9 (2020/06/20)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.9)
General changes:
    * #350 When editing a 'try' route, you're redirected to the route edit page (keystone.guru/xxxx/edit). You can as such refresh the page as you like. You (or anyone with the link) can claim the route and save it to their profile.
    * #328 'Published' is no longer a separate column in route tables. It has been replaced by an icon in the title.

Map changes:
    * #352 Clicking on an Awakened Obelisk will allow you to easily place a gateway (and line between them).
    * #305 Lots of internal changes to the structure behind the mapping, allowing me to more rapidly develop new features.

Mapping changes:
    * #325 Corrected Tol Dagor/Shrine of the Storm Awakened enemies enemy forces on Teeming weeks. Fixed various other enemy forces calculations.

Team changes:
    * #327 Admins may now leave their teams.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.9](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.9)

General changes:
* [\#350](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/350) When editing a 'try' route, you're redirected to the route edit page (keystone.guru/xxxx/edit). You can as such refresh the page as you like. You (or anyone with the link) can claim the route and save it to their profile.
* [\#328](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/328) 'Published' is no longer a separate column in route tables. It has been replaced by an icon in the title.

Map changes:
* [\#352](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/352) Clicking on an Awakened Obelisk will allow you to easily place a gateway (and line between them).
* [\#305](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/305) Lots of internal changes to the structure behind the mapping, allowing me to more rapidly develop new features.

Mapping changes:
* [\#325](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/325) Corrected Tol Dagor/Shrine of the Storm Awakened enemies enemy forces on Teeming weeks. Fixed various other enemy forces calculations.

Team changes:
* [\#327](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/327) Admins may now leave their teams.

changes.change: When editing a 'try' route, you're redirected to the route edit page (keystone.guru/xxxx/edit). You can as such refresh the page as you like. You (or anyone with the link) can claim the route and save it to their profile.
'Published' is no longer a separate column in route tables. It has been replaced by an icon in the title.
Clicking on an Awakened Obelisk will allow you to easily place a gateway (and line between them).
Lots of internal changes to the structure behind the mapping, allowing me to more rapidly develop new features.
Corrected Tol Dagor/Shrine of the Storm Awakened enemies enemy forces on Teeming weeks. Fixed various other enemy forces calculations.
Admins may now leave their teams.
